description:
Yellow... Blue...?
Soy milk...? Milk coffee...!?
Alkali!?
"Today, Koizumi was eating some kind of water-colored ramen."
Ramen is... the universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Michi Aji no Ramen / Mawaru Ramen / Chousen Uketsukechuu!!
Ramen aux étranges saveurs / Ramen su tapis roulant / Relever le défi !
Ramen with Unknown Flavor / Conveyor Belt Ramen / Accepting Challenges!!
未知味の拉麺 / まわるラーメン / 挑戦受付中!!
미지의 맛 라멘 / 회전 라멘 / 라멘 도전 접수 중!!
